name: .PAPERT
summary: Learn about .PAPERT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open PAPERT files with Dropbox Paper in a web browser or the Dropbox Paper (Android) and Paper by Dropbox (iOS) mobile apps. Since Paper only uses PAPERT files internally, no third-party apps support them.

All PAPER documents are accessible from the Paper Home screen, and you can click them to open them. You may also find them in your Dropbox folder if you have the Dropbox desktop app installed, but when you double-click the PAPERT files, they will open in the Paper workspace in your web browser.
Dropbox Paper can convert PAPERT templates to several file types, including the following formats:
You can convert PAPER files by clicking the menu (three horizontal dots) in the upper-right corner of the workspace and then selecting Export.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .papert file in Dropbox Paper
images.caption: PAPERT file open in Dropbox Paper
